name: Pongarena (itch)
description:
New update: this version is now completely free. When Pongarena V2 will be launched all player who bought this version will get it for free (you can still buy this version and you'll be eligible for the free V2 version).

A powered up version of the arcade classic pong.
This is not just tennis, this time it's a shoot'em up.



Score the most goals by shooting the ball with your blaster.
Use either the fast but weak fire mode or wait for the big one.

It is Gamepad compatible! Plug gamepads and get twice fun!

Features

- CPU or VS Mode
- 2 fire mode (Weak/Fast) or (Strong/Slow)
- Keyboard, Gamepad and Touch compatible

All purchase on itch.io will unlock the version on Nebula and Steam (when released, you'll have to ask for the key).

D.I.Y Arcade Version

We also made a D.I.Y Arcade version of Pongarena, it's really fun.

You can Check out the website for more details.


Let's stay in Touch!
